sections.heading: to 6-28. - Sections 6-3 to 6-28, inclusive, are repealed
sections.text: Section 6-28a. - Statutory references to county commissioners or treasurers changed.Section 6-28b. - Employment of former county employees after military service.

sections.heading: Statutory references to county commissioners or treasurers changed.
sections.text:
Any reference in the general statutes or special acts to county commissioners or county treasurers, or their powers and duties, shall be to the state or the State Treasurer, as the case may be.

(1959, P.A. 152, S. 98.)

sections.heading: Employment of former county employees after military service.
sections.text:
Section 6-28b is repealed, effective October 1, 2002.

(1959, P.A. 152, S. 21; P.A. 77-614, S. 66, 610; S.A. 02-12, S. 1.)
